item.title: Install PHP7.2 MongoDB
item.description: 1$ git clone https://github.com/mongodb/mongo-php-driver.git 2$ cd mongo-php-driver 3$ git submodule sync && git submodule update --init 4$ phpize 5$ ./configure 6$ make all -j 5 7$ sudo make install Details in https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb.installation.manual.php or https://stackoverflow.com/questions/46276978/install-mongodb-driver-in-cent-os-7-with-php7-1 In my case, I also had to add to 20-mongodb.ini.
